metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46141 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.6. It performs invalid freeoperations in uriFreeUriMembers and uriMakeOwner.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46141` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liburiparser1 - 0.8.4-1+deb9u2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: uriparser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.4-1+deb9u2ubuntu0.1').
